com.milk.uberchat.command
Class SystemCommands

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.milk.uberchat.command.SystemCommands
public final class SystemCommands
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains Commands for ChatSystem objects as inner classes and knows how to manage them.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.
See Also:
ChatSystem

Nested Class Summary
private  class SystemCommands.Connect
          This is the command associated with the connect() operation.
private  class SystemCommands.Disconnect
          This is the command associated with the disconnect() operation.
private  class SystemCommands.MyCommand
          This is the superclass of the commands defined in this class.
private  class SystemCommands.MySystemListener
          This is the listener that listens to the system object and enables/disables the commands as appropriate.

Constructor Detail

SystemCommands

public SystemCommands(ChatSystem system)
Construct a SystemCommands object. Constructing the object automatically causes it to add a listener to the specified system, but it doesn't actually add any commands (since, as a separate entity, it has no capability to add commands to it).

Parameters:
system - non-null; the system to use
Method Detail

getCommands

public Command[] getCommands()
Get the commands that this object manages.

Returns:
an array of commands
